title: Electric PE - new U when distance increases 4x

content.question: When two charged particles are separated by a distance <math alttext="d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>d</mi></math>, the electric potential energy of the two-particle system is <math alttext="U" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>U</mi></math>. What is the electric potential energy of the system when the same particles are separated by a distance <math alttext="4 d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><mi>d</mi></math>?

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
